smartGrow.title: Farm Smarter, Grow Together
smartGrow.description_1: Empowering farmers with simple digital tools, real-time insights, and a supportive community to boost productivity and profits.
smartGrow.description_2: Join a growing network of farmers using smart tools, market insights, and expert guidance to make better decisions and achieve more together.
smartGrow.description_3: From weather updates to mandi rates and crop advice, we help you farm smarter while connecting you with a community that grows stronger together.
smartGrow.image_1_alt: Farmer using digital tools for crop management

ourtVision.title: Our Vision
ourtVision.subtitle_1: To bridge the gap between traditional wisdom and modern technology, ensuring every farmer—big or small—has access to
ourtVision.subtitle_2: information, opportunities, and innovations that can transform
ourtVision.paragraph_1: their fields and their future. KhetiVikaas,

features.title: Crop Advisory
features.text: We provide guidance on crop health, pest management, and best farming practices tailored to your region.

features.title: Mandi Rates
features.text: Know the market instantly — helping farmers sell their produce at fair prices and plan ahead effectively.

features.title: Weather Updates
features.text: Accurate, localized weather information to help you schedule sowing, irrigation, and harvesting efficiently.

features.title: Marketplace
features.text: Connect with trusted buyers and sellers, compare prices, and access essential farming products all in one place.

features.title: Community Support
features.text: Join a thriving network of farmers and agronomists to exchange advice, tips, and real-world solutions.

features.title: Crop Record Management
features.text: Track every crop, cost, and yield in one smart digital ledger.

makingDifference.title: Making a Difference in Every Field
makingDifference.description_1: KhetiVikaas is a platform built to empower farmers and make trading simple, fair, and rewarding. While fair prices ensure your hard work is valued.
makingDifference.description_2: With our 'Local First' approach, we help you connect directly with your community, supporting local growth and opportunities. Explore endless ways to trade, grow, and thrive with KhetiVikaas—your trusted partner in farming.

marketplace.title: Marketplace – Trade with Trust, Grow with Freedom

zeroCommission.title: Zero Commission for Individuals
zeroCommission.text: Farmers keep every rupee they earn — no hidden charges or deductions.

fairPrices.title: Fair Prices
fairPrices.text: Compare real-time offers and choose the best deal for your produce with complete transparency.

localFirst.title: Local First
localFirst.text: Find buyers and sellers from your own region, building stronger and faster local trade connections.

endlessOpportunities.title: Endless Opportunities
endlessOpportunities.text: List your crops freely and connect with trusted buyers and sellers to grow your business with confidence.

description.text: On KhetiVikaas, I’m not alone. I learn from other farmers, get instant guidance, and feel part of a bigger community working together for growth.
